pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-2981] Add script paths to code analysis customizer panels
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-2981

Add AnalysisDefaultDocumentListener class to avoid duplicating code
Add AnalysisUiUtils class to avoid duplicating code (Browse and Search files)

I added AnalysisDefaultDocumentListener class because there were many similar implementations of DocumentListener. I hope there are no problems.
Scrrenshots

Before

After

CS Fixer
Before

After

Before

After

PHPStan
Before

After

nodes.bodyText: One day, we could add a method getFirstError() (and getFirstWarning()).
Could we avoid using FQN here in this panel, please? It makes the code more readable, I believe. Thank you.
Again, FQN used in this panel...

commit.message:
[NETBEANS-2981] Add the script path to the PHPStan customizer panel

- Introduce AnalysisDefaultDocumentListener class to avoid duplicating code
- Introduce AnalysisUiUtils class to avoid duplicating code (Browse and Search files)
- The default path is used if the customizer path is empty
[NETBEANS-2981] Add the script path to Coding Standards Fixer customizer panel

beforeCommit.message: Use AnalysisDefaultDocumentListener instead of DafaultDocumentListener of inner classes

afterCommit.message: Use AnalysisDefaultDocumentListener instead of DafaultDocumentListener of inner classes
